verses.verse: For <WG1063> the Torah <WG3551> having <WG2192> <WG5723> a shadow <WG4639> of good things <WG18> to come <WG3195> <WG5723>, and not <WG3756> the very <WG846> image <WG1504> of the things <WG4229>, can <WG1410> <WG5736> never <WG3763> with those <WG846> sacrifices <WG2378> which <WG3739> they offered <WG4374> <WG5719> year by year <WG2596> <WG1763> continually <WG1519> <WG1336> make <WG5048> the comers thereunto <WG4334> <WG5740> perfect <WG5048> <WG5658>.
